alert.note: Alert for Barber; Clark; Comanche; Edwards; Ford; Grant; Gray; Haskell; Hodgeman; Kiowa; Meade; Morton; Pawnee; Pratt; Rush; Seward; Stafford; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 28 at 3:07PM CDT until March 29 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS TUESDAY... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 10 PM CDT TUESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 046...064...065...066...075...076...077...078...079...080...081... 084...085...086... 087...088...089 AND 090... The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 1 PM to 10 PM CDT Tuesday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * Affected Area...In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 046 Rush...Fire Weather Zone 064 Hodgeman...Fire Weather Zone 065 Pawnee... Fire Weather Zone 066 Stafford...Fire Weather Zone 075 Grant... Fire Weather Zone 076 Haskell...Fire Weather Zone 077 Gray... Fire Weather Zone 078 Ford...Fire Weather Zone 079 Edwards... Fire Weather Zone 080 Kiowa...Fire Weather Zone 081 Pratt... Fire Weather Zone 084 Morton...Fire Weather Zone 085 Stevens... Fire Weather Zone 086 Seward...Fire Weather Zone 087 Meade... Fire Weather Zone 088 Clark...Fire Weather Zone 089 Comanche and Fire Weather Zone 090 Barber. * Winds...Southwest 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * Timing...Tuesday Afternoon and Evening. * Relative Humidity...As low as 11 percent. * Temperatures...In the 80s. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
